description: Describes the storage tier status of one or more Amazon EBS snapshots.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters. snapshot-id - The snapshot ID. volume-id - The ID of the volume the snapshot is for. last-tiering-operation - The state of the last archive or restore action. ( archival-in-progress | archival-completed | archival-failed | permanent-restore-in-progress | permanent-restore-completed | permanent-restore-failed | temporary-restore-in-progress | temporary-restore-completed | temporary-restore-failed) (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SnapshotTierStatuses
nested_items.description: Information about the snapshot's storage tier.

nested_items.name: VolumeId
nested_items.description: The ID of the volume from which the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the snapshot.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags that are assigned to the snapshot.

nested_items.name: StorageTier
nested_items.description: The storage tier in which the snapshot is stored. standard indicates that the snapshot is stored in the standard snapshot storage tier and that it is ready for use. archive indicates that the snapshot is currently archived and that it must be restored before it can be used.

nested_items.name: LastTieringStartTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the last archive or restore process was started.

nested_items.name: LastTieringProgress
nested_items.description: The progress of the last archive or restore process, as a percentage.

nested_items.name: LastTieringOperationStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the last archive or restore process.

nested_items.name: LastTieringOperationStatusDetail
nested_items.description: A message describing the status of the last archive or restore process.

nested_items.name: ArchivalCompleteTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the last archive process was completed.

nested_items.name: RestoreExpiryTime
nested_items.description: Only for archived snapshots that are temporarily restored. Indicates the date and time when a temporarily restored snapshot will be automatically re-archived.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to include in another request to get the next page of items. This value is null when there are no more items to return.
